*NVM if want to install new version of node purpose compatibility of version

install java using homebrew install terminal

cask under homebrew to install GUI application

last option in browser installation

https://bems-ph.bizwind.co.jp/portal/timerecord

http://bss.bizwind.co.jp/skill_sheet/

スペースURL：https://biz1.backlog.jp

ユーザID：Del.Rosario.Jerome

パスワード：JhfknHbu

encounter Error 

fatal: Could not resolve HEAD to a revision
Already up-to-date.

run:
brew update-reset
brew install java
brew install jenv


brew tap adoptopenjdk/openjdk

brew tap homebrew/cask-versions


brew install --cask homebrew/cask-versions/adoptopenjdk8

brew install openjdk@8

echo 'export PATH="$HOME/.jenv/bin:$PATH"' >> ~/.zshrc

echo 'eval "$(jenv init -)"' >> ~/.zshrc

restart terminal 

jenv add /Library/Java/JavaVirtualMachines/adoptopenjdk-8.jdk/Contents/Home




install java 11

brew install openjdk@11

brew tap adoptopenjdk/openjdk

brew search adoptopenjdk

brew install --cask adoptopenjdk11

jenv add /Library/Java/JavaVirtualMachines/adoptopenjdk-11.jdk/Contents/Home

ADD hightlight in git

git config --global core.pager "`brew --prefix git`/share/git-core/contrib/diff-highlight/diff-highlight | less"
